derivation: a primitive root; properly to be complete, but used only as a denominative from H7651 (שֶׁבַע);
outline:
1. to swear, adjure
    1. (Qal) sworn (participle)
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to swear, take an oath
      2. to swear (of Jehovah by Himself)
      3. to curse
    3. (Hiphil)
      1. to cause to take an oath
      2. to adjure
kjv_def: adjure, charge (by an oath, with an oath), feed to the full (by mistake for H7646 (שָׂבַע)), take an oath, [idiom] straitly, (cause to, make to) swear.
strongs_def: to seven oneself, i.e. swear (as if by repeating a declaration seven times)
